英文法規名稱: Fee-charging Standards for Yangmingshuwu of Yangmingshan National Park
中文法規名稱: 陽明山國家公園陽明書屋門票收費標準
沿革內容:
1.Promulgated on January 15, 2015
2.Amended and promulgated by Order Ying-Yang-You-Zi No.1061000495 of the Yangmingshan National Park Headquarters on February 13, 2017, by amending Article 2

法規內容.條文內容: These Standards are promulgated according to Paragraph 1 of Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.

The entrance and tour fees of Yangmingshuwu Zhongxing Guesthouse are as follows:
1.General admission: Adult price 80NTD.
2.ROC citizens with relevant ID, approved documents, or other related documents shall be charged discount prices:
a.Half price discount:
i.Seniors over the age of 65 visiting on holidays  .
ii.Students. Foreign nationals enrolled in Taiwanese public or private schools shall also receive half price concessions.
b.Free of charge:
i.Children under the age of 12.
ii.Seniors over the age of 65 visiting on non-holidays (working days)  .
iii.Persons with disability , along with one companion.
iv.Observing government officials.
v.Holders of a Service Honor Card.
vi.Visitors who may enter free of charge according to other related law decrees.
These Standards shall be effective from the date of promulgation.
